comment: Her class gave me something to look forward to each week! In spite of the classmates in my group never showing(group projects), I ended up making one of my highest grades in Professor Levy's class.  I would absolutely take another class with her if my major allowed.  1010 as far as I see.

She really does try to help you out. There have been numerous times when I forgot an assignment was do, and after simply talking to her, she extended the due date. She is very understanding, and very enthusiastic on the course. If you do the bare minimum, you should get  a B, then if you put in an hour or two a week, you'll get an A. Take her.
